definitions.definition: A device used in sailing , for two main configurations of rig :

subdefinitions.definition: A wire that leads from a point near the end of a gaff to a point near the other end. A block travels along this wire, and a halyard is attached to the block. This allows the gaff to be raised to the vertical by a single halyard.
A set of hoops or parrel beads which secure the gaff loosely to the mast in a vertical position.

main_definition: ( sailing ) A device used in sailing , for two main configurations of rig :
